title: Dark_Tips
author: Dark_Tips
content: Hello. I hope this is the appropriate place to post this question.I am in need of a high volume API that I can call on to provide crypto/fiat prices. Free is preferable, but crypto payments would work.Obviously many onion network-based services have this. Can anyone point me to which APIs people are using for this? Not for anything shady.Please send me a message if you would rather do that then post it publicly.Thank you for your time.

comments.author: Dark_Tips
comments.body: Thanks for the suggestion, but that's not really what I'm looking for.I need an API that provides all kinds of exchange rates.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Well this area *is* strictly for Bitcoin topics so you will only get BTC answers. For crapcoins, post your question in the Altcoin areas.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Dark_Tips on March 03, 2025, 07:28:25 PMI am in need of a high volume API that I can call on to provide crypto/fiat prices. Free is preferable, but crypto payments would work.I only knew of one API with an onion service, but the following alternatives might come in handy:Blockchair's API - You can use their free plan for a few days with a limit of 1,000 calls per day.- For some reason, the API section of their onion services has some issues.CoinGecko's API - Their free plan comes with a limit of 30 calls per minute [monthly cap is at 10,000 calls].CoinMarketCap's API - 10,000 monthly calls on their free plan.CoinPaprika's API - 20,000 monthly calls on their free plan.CoinLore's API - No limits, but they recommend one call per second.Coinranking's API - 5,000 monthly calls on their free plan.Note: I prefer not to vouch, so DYOR.
